name: Epic Fruit Game
description:
DESCRIPTION: 

Ah the Pacific Northwest. Home to nature, trees and all things green. On a lovely summer that seems to be all year round for this place, can you, a lovely tomato, find a lover to cherish this summer—

Wait a second, why are there zombies all over the place?!

Welcome to Epic Fruit Game!! In the lovely hours of very late spring, zombies had just begun to rise from the river to devour everything on sight!! Trapped in City Hall, you find five other survivors ready to love, be loved and bash zombie heads. Dodge zombies and make friendships (and lovers?!) on the road to safer heavens. 

FEATURES:

(CAUTION!!: THIS IS A DEMO!! ALL FEATURES IN THE GAME MIGHT NOT BE IMPLEMENTED YET!!)

- ZOMBIES EVERYWHERE!!
- Multiple characters to romance and multiple endings!!
- Weird achievements
- Pipe bombs explosions
- YOU'RE SIMPING??? OVER A FRUIT?!!!
